sql-query.name: QueryProcessInstanceList
sql-query.content: select procinst.procinst_id id, procdef.type_id, procinst.procdef_id, procdef.state procdef_state, procinst.title, procinst.business_id, procinst.start_user_id, procinst.start_time, procinst.end_time, procinst.state, procinst.tenant_id from bpm_hi_procinst procinst left join bpm_re_procdef procdef on (procdef.id = procinst.procdef_id) union select procinst.procinst_id id, procdef.type_id, procinst.procdef_id, procdef.state procdef_state, procinst.title, procinst.business_id, procinst.start_user_id, procinst.start_time, null end_time, procinst.state, procinst.tenant_id from bpm_ru_procinst procinst left join bpm_re_procdef procdef on (procdef.id = procinst.procdef_id)
